main event: Observers reported seeing a bright light in the sky, which they believed to be a satellite, moving rapidly in a northerly direction.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1 hour and 10 minutes., The object was described as being like a bright star., There were multiple reports of sightings around the same time in the past., The observers were confused about the repeated appearances of the object at the same time of night., The report concluded that further investigation was not warranted due to lack of evidence.
witness description: The observer noted hearing a sharp whistling sound and described the light as very bright and moving quickly, without any flashing lights.
